processing_structure.text: Loop from 1 to the input value

advice.text: Make sure the task is clear: read one integer and output the sum of its divisors.
Think about what must happen inside the loop: how to check if a number is a divisor and when to add it to the sum.
Under the loop comment, write sub-comments like 'for each i: if i divides n then add i to sum'; then use those sub-comments to guide coding.
